Platform.Title: Agilent Clostridium perfringens 15K array
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: see the manufacturer's website at http://www.agilent.com/
Platform.Description: Clostridium Perfringens S13 expression array (Genome + plasmide) The ID column represents the Agilent Feature Extraction feature number.

Sample.Title: CP-Hcys01-cy3

Channel.Source: strain 13 grown in the presence of cystine
Channel.Growth-Protocol: C. perfringens strain 13 was grown in minimal medium in the presence of 1 mM homocysteine or 0.5 mM cystine until late exponential growth phase.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Trizol following manufacturer's instructions.
Channel.Label: cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: 10 µg of total RNA and pdN6 primer were heated at 70°C for 5 min, then reversed transcribed at 42°C for 3 h in the presence of 1600 U SuperScript III Reverse Transcriptase (Invitrogen), each dATP, dTTP, dGTP, dCTP. cDNA were then incubated with cy5 or cy3 dyes 1h at room temperature in the dark.

Channel.Source: strain 13 grown in the presence of homocysteine
Channel.Growth-Protocol: C. perfringens strain 13 was grown in minimal medium in the presence of 1 mM homocysteine or 0.5 mM cystine until late exponential growth phase.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Trizol following manufacturer's instructions.
Channel.Label: cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: 10 µg of total RNA and pdN6 primer were heated at 70°C for 5 min, then reversed transcribed at 42°C for 3 h in the presence of 1600 U SuperScript III Reverse Transcriptase (Invitrogen), each dATP, dTTP, dGTP, dCTP. cDNA were then incubated with cy5 or cy3 dyes 1h at room temperature in the dark.

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Samples were applied to microarrays enclosed in Agilent hybridization chambers for 17h at 65°C. After hybridization, slides were washed with Agilent washing buffers.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Scanned on an GenePix 4200L dual-channel laser scanner.
Sample.Data-Processing: R limma package - Function used - Background correction : backgroundCorrect normexp ; Normalization : normalizeWithinArrays loess - Correlation of spot duplicat : duplicateCorrelation - Adjust to linear method : lmFit - Statistical analysis : eBayes, decideTests global BH.

Series.Title: C. perfringens 13 strain: growth with 1 mM homocysteine vs growth with 0.5 mM cystine
Series.Summary: Transcriptionnal profiling of C. perfringens 13 strain comparing growth in minimal medium with 1 mM homocysteine with growth in minimal medium with 0.5 mM cystine.
Series.Overall-Design: two-condition experiment, homocysteine vs cystine, 4 biological replicates for each condition
